body:
Hi Omid, Ah, I did wonder if that was the case, I started tow swap out some components, but they have slightly different terminals etc, so the definition can't easily be swapped about.

I'll take a look at the sample folders.. Thanks again.

PS, if anyone manages to update the definition in this thread to work with the new version of butterfly, I'd appreciate the link, I'm quite new to Grasshopper and find it quite daunting!
